This ModelBrick from the article, " Sniffers, buzzers, togglesand blinkers â€¦" describes a system containing both positive andnegative feedback, resulting in oscillations. The response element (R)is created in an autocatalytic process, and then it promotes theproduction of an inhibitor, X, which speeds up R removal. First, Rbuilds up, then comes X to force R back down, then X disappears and Rcan rise again.
